Description: Corroded copper alloy eight-shaped link, with two loops separated by a middle part in the shape of a rice grain; possibly the central link joining the mouthpiece cannons of a snaffle bit.
Curator's comments: One of the elements of "chain of O and of 8 links" mentioned by W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 80 § 80 ?
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 80 § 80)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.50, p.80, p.185, pl.27)
